abstractdt

Class Form

  • java.lang.Object
    • abstractdt.Form

  • public class Form
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing an abstraction of the Form Element w.r.t. W3C specification A Form can contain several types of controls

    LABEL, SELECT, OPTGROUP, OPTION, TEXTAREA, FIELDSET, LEGEND, BUTTON

    Author:
    tsigalko18
